LanguageData.UpperHighThought.stages.0.label: 苯丙胺亢奋
LanguageData.UpperWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 苯丙胺戒断
LanguageData.UpperWithdrawal.stages.1.description: 我总是好困，脑袋好重快撑不住了。
LanguageData.opioidHigh.stages.0.label: 鸦片亢奋
LanguageData.opioidHigh.stages.0.description: 我很宁静。贤者模式已启动。
LanguageData.opioid2High.stages.0.label: 吗啡亢奋
LanguageData.opioid2High.stages.0.description: 我感觉轻快多了。针不戳。
LanguageData.opioid3High.stages.0.label: 海洛因亢奋
LanguageData.opioid3High.stages.0.description: 我已经飘飘欲仙了。我飞升了……
LanguageData.opioidWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 阿片类戒断
LanguageData.opioidWithdrawal.stages.1.description: 眼睛疼，浑身都疼，什么都干不下去。我好难受……
LanguageData.CyanideHighThought.stages.0.label: 氰化物中毒
LanguageData.CyanideHighThought.stages.0.description: 我坐不住了，感觉心脏在我的胸腔里咚咚地跳个不停，我是不是要死了？
LanguageData.JoyHigh.stages.0.label: 摇头丸亢奋
LanguageData.JoyWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 摇头丸戒断
LanguageData.TeaHigh.stages.0.label: 玫瑰茶暖身
LanguageData.TeaHigh.stages.0.description: 这茶有一种独特的香味，我还蛮喜欢的。
LanguageData.PeyoteHigh.stages.0.label: 皮耶果幻觉
LanguageData.PeyoteHigh.stages.0.description: 我能听到大自然的声音。
LanguageData.PeyoteWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 皮耶果戒断
LanguageData.AniracetamBrainFogThought.stages.0.label: 阿尼西坦的副作用
LanguageData.HypnotolAddictionThought.stages.0.label: 催眠剂抗拒作用
LanguageData.HypnotolAddictionThought.stages.0.descri: 我在干什么？我控制不住我自己啊！
